abstract: Sanofi Aventis says its $69-a-share bid for Genzyme will remain open until Jan. 21, in a move that will keep the proposed deal alive.
snippet: Sanofi Aventis says its $69-a-share bid for Genzyme will remain open until Jan. 21, in a move that will keep the proposed deal alive.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi Aventis said on Monday that it would extend its $18.5 billion offer for Genzyme until Jan. 21, in a move to keep its proposed deal alive.

headline.main: Sanofi Extends Its $18.5 Billion Genzyme Offer
